product_name: adidas Hiking Light Down Jacket - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The weather can turn fast when you're out in the mountains. Carry the adidas Hiking Light Down Jacket and pull it on when the temperatures plummet. 100% polyester shell is filled with 650-fill-power goose down and feathers for good warmth on chilly fall, winter and spring days. Articulated sleeves allow freedom of movement for increased comfort. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick sleeve cuffs let you adjust the fit. Includes zippered hand pockets. Overstock.
short_description: The weather can turn fast when you're out in the mountains. Carry the adidas Hiking Light Down Jacket and pull it on when the temperatures plummet.
